# Telegram Configuration
TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN=your_telegram_bot_token_here

# Security \(Optional\)

GIST_ID=your_32_character_gist_id

RSS_FEED_URLS=https://rss.app/feeds/feed1.xml,https://rss.app/feeds/feed2.xml
